title: REVERSIBLE JACKET WITH SILK SCARF MOTIF
desc: Reversible, single-breasted, straight-cut jacket with relaxed fit, made from wool- and silk-blend fabric. This garment features a silk scarf-inspired motif on one side and plain-coloured fabric on the other.• Relaxed fit• Single-breasted button closure• Working cuffs• Welt pockets at the front• Rear vent• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size 40
